Regulation Name(s): Respiratory viral panel multiplex nucleic acid assay
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Applied Biosystems 7500 Fast Dx Real-Time PCR Instrument
bioMérieux NucliSENS easyMAG System (for nucleic acid extraction)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Lyra™ Adenovirus Assay, a real-time PCR test for qualitative detection of adenovirus DNA from nasal and nasopharyngeal swabs
Indications for Use Summary: A real-time PCR in vitro diagnostic test for qualitative detection of human adenovirus DNA from nasal and nasopharyngeal swabs from symptomatic individuals, aiding in diagnosis in conjunction with other findings
